headline: 11 Things Coming in 2022
author: Annika Tomlin
sentences: Declared gubernatorial candidates include Republicans Kari Lake, Kimberly Yee and Steve Gaynor, along with Democrats Katie Hobbs, Aaron Lieberman and Marco Lopez Jr. Senate candidates include incumbent Democrat Mark Kelly, and Republicans Mark Brnovich, Jim Lamon, Blake Masters, Michael McGuire, Justin Olson and Robert Paveza.

“THE BATMAN”
This chapter of the “Batman” franchise stars Robert Pattinson in the title role alongside Zoë Kravitz, Paul Dano, Jeffrey Wright, John Turturro, Peter Sarsgaard, Andy Serkis and Colin Farrell.

“DOCTOR STRANGE IN THE MULTIVERSE OF MADNESS”
The year is chock-full of highly anticipated movies, including the Marvel Cinematic Universe’s “Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness” on Friday, May 6.

ROSE PARADE
As COVID-19 conditions are more regulated and with the distribution of several vaccines, the Rose Parade will return bright and early January 1 in Pasadena.

PARALYMPICS/WINTER OLYMPICS
The 2022 Winter Olympics and Paralympics are set for Beijing, the first city to host the summer and winter Olympic and Paralympic games.
The 2022 offering will feature 18 equestrian units, 22 marching bands, a plethora of floats and, of course, a Rose Court helmed by Rose Queen Nadia Chung.

SUPER BOWL
